attributes.action: Stop paying Council Tax when you reach retirement age.
attributes.additional_details: All we actually see for this is our bins being emptied. It would make a huge difference to pensioner finances.
attributes.background: Rescind the Council Tax liability upon reaching retirement age.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same/a similar action:  
 https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635079

Or you may want to create a new petition with the following title and description. 

"Abolish council tax for UK citizens at and above retirement age"

"Rescind the Council Tax liability upon reaching retirement age. It would make a huge difference to pensioner finances."
